Embark on a Journey of Global Excellence and Leadership at Royale Concorde International School

Unlocking Potential Beyond the Classroom, Royale Concorde International School Fosters Curiosity, Creativity, and Self-Belief.

With a strong presence in both Bangalore and Mysore, we provide a forward-thinking, globally renowned education that nurtures individual talents and passions. Prepare for a journey of self-assuredness with us!

Our committed educators create an enriching learning atmosphere, promoting the expression of unique abilities and passions, equipping students for a journey filled with confidence in the global arena.

Read More

Royale Concorde International School: Shaping Students for Future Success, Equipping Them with Skills and Knowledge to Excel in a Rapidly Changing World.

Why Royale Concorde International School?

We’re a premier CBSE school in Bangalore, offering holistic education from Pre-primary to Secondary levels. Our dedicated teaching team nurtures intellectual, emotional, and physical growth. As a top 10 CBSE school, we foster problem-solving skills and curiosity, while also recognizing academic excellence through scholarships.

With exceptional facilities, awards, and international recognition, Royale Concorde International School stands as a top educational choice.

Read More
Play Video

Take a Sneak-Peek At Royale Concorde International School

Explore the captivating moments of events & celebrations at Royale Concorde International School,
showcasing our state-of-the-art infrastructure and vibrant co-curricular activities.
